required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Study of Apatinib in the Treatment of Advanced Ovarian Cancer After the Failure of Standard Chemotherapy
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Study of Apatinib in the Treatment of Advanced Ovarian Cancer After the Failure of Standard Chemotherapy

brief_summary.textblock: To Observe and Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Apatinib in Patients With Advanced Ovarian Cancer After the Failure of Standard Chemotherapy

detailed_description.textblock: Eligible patients will receive apatinib 500mg/d po until disease progression or intolerable toxicity or patients withdrawal of consent after the failure of chemotherapy or radiotherapy

primary_outcome.description: The time from the beginning of treatment to observing the progression of the disease or the death of any cause

arm_group.description: Apatinib 500mg/d po,28 days as one cycle

intervention.description: Apatinib 500mg/d po,28 days as one cycle
